tool.name: Convert a GFF file
tool.description: with corresponding FASTA sequences to a GenBank file.
tool.help:
Convert a GFF file with corresponding FASTA sequences to a GenBank file.
**Inputs**
**GFF file**
* GFF file. Here is an example file:
* Example::
##source-version GeneMark.hmm_PROKARYOTIC 2.7d ##date Wed Dec 15 16:40:35 2010 ##Sequence file name: A10_LargeContigs_contigids_only.fsa ##Model file name: MetaGeneMark_v1.mod
contig00001 GeneMark.hmm gene 3 68 . - 0 gene_id 1 contig00001 GeneMark.hmm gene 765 1205 . - 0 gene_id 2 contig00002 GeneMark.hmm gene 1 162 . + 0 gene_id 3 contig00002 GeneMark.hmm gene 197 337 . - 0 gene_id 4 contig00002 GeneMark.hmm gene 527 1117 . + 0 gene_id 5
